## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] No unnecessary console.logs or debug code
- [ ] Code is DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself)

### Testing

- [ ] Added/updated unit tests
- [ ] Added/updated integration tests
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] Coverage meets requirements (80% backend, 70% frontend)

### Documentation

- [ ] Updated README.md (if needed)
- [ ] Updated API documentation (if backend changes)
- [ ] Updated inline code documentation
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)

### Security

- [ ] No secrets or credentials in code
- [ ] Security best practices followed
- [ ] Dependencies updated and scanned
- [ ] No known vulnerabilities introduced

### Performance

- [ ] No performance regressions
- [ ] Optimizations documented
- [ ] Database queries optimized (if applicable)
- [ ] Bundle size acceptable (if frontend)

### Backend Specific

- [ ] Database migrations created (if schema changes)
- [ ] API endpoints documented
- [ ] Type hints added
- [ ] Error handling implemented
- [ ] Logging added for debugging

### Frontend Specific

- [ ] Responsive design tested
- [ ] Accessibility (a11y) considered
- [ ] Cross-browser compatibility checked
- [ ] Internationalization (i18n) updated (if needed)
- [ ] Loading states handled
- [ ] Error states handled

### Mobile Specific

- [ ] Tested on iOS (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested on Android (if applicable)
- [ ] Offline functionality works
- [ ] Push notifications tested (if applicable)

## Reviewer Notes

<!-- Specific areas you'd like reviewers to focus on -->

---

**Before submitting:**

- [ ] Branch is up to date with base branch
- [ ] All CI/CD checks pass
- [ ] PR title follows convention: `type(scope): description`
  - Types: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, test, chore
  - Example: `feat(backend): add user profile endpoints`
